project.name: jquery-plugin.multiDialog
project.description: MultiDialog utilizes jQuery UI Dialog Widget for a full featured Modalbox / Lightbox application.

fn.MultiDialog.name: fn.MultiDialog
fn.MultiDialog.description: This is the jQuery plugin definition (singleton instance)

classitems.description: Enable description pan
classitems.name: descEnabled

classitems.description: jQuery UI Dialog options: see jQuery UI Dialog docs for all options, some options are not available!
classitems.name: dialog

classitems.description: Close MultiDialog by click on overlay
classitems.name: dialog.closeModalOnClick

classitems.description: Width of the content (not overall size, "auto" not allowed)
classitems.name: dialog.width

classitems.description: Height of the content (not overall size, "auto" not allowed)
classitems.name: dialog.height

classitems.description: Animate the resizing and positioning mechanism
classitems.name: dialog.useAnimation

classitems.description: Animate options as defined for jQuery UI show and hide options (see jQuery UI documentation)
classitems.name: dialog.animateOptions

classitems.description: jQuery UI Dialog resize callback event (please note: native close, open and resize callbacks are not available)
classitems.name: dialog.resized

classitems.description: Do not alter this property!
classitems.name: dialog.useContentSize

classitems.description: Disable plugin
classitems.name: dialog.disabled

classitems.description: GET variable prefix (?ajax=true)
classitems.name: dialog.getVarPrefix

classitems.description:
Initial and main method
Could be used when MultiDialog instance is created manually
classitems.name: _create

params.name: _elements
params.description: A set of jQuery selected HTML elments (one or more)

params.name: _options
params.description: _options Object with all options, see defaults

classitems.description: Fires Callback, see {{#crossLink "MultiDialog/_fireCallback:method"}}{{/crossLink}} for return value.
classitems.name: on.create

classitems.description: Opens an image
classitems.name: openImage

params.name: data
params.description: Object: data.element = link (a tag) as jQuery Object with href pointing to an image, String: URL to an image, jQuery Object: of a ima tag

classitems.description: Fires Callback, see {{#crossLink "MultiDialog/_fireCallback:method"}}{{/crossLink}} for return value.
classitems.name: on.imageError

classitems.description: Opens an iframe
classitems.name: openIframe

params.name: data
params.description: Object: data.element = link (a tag) as jQuery Object, String: URL, jQuery Object: a link (a tag) element

classitems.description: Opens inline HTML: works with an anchor url
classitems.name: openImage

params.name: data
params.description: Object: data.href = link (a tag) as jQuery Object with an anchor pointing to an currently available HTML element with that anchor as id attribute

classitems.description: Fires Callback, see {{#crossLink "MultiDialog/_fireCallback:method"}}{{/crossLink}} for return value.
classitems.name: on.inlineError

classitems.description: Opens YouTube video
classitems.name: openYoutube

params.name: data
params.description: Object: data.href = link (a tag) as jQuery Object

classitems.description: Opens Vimeo video
classitems.name: openVimeo

params.name: data
params.description: Object: data.href = link (a tag) as jQuery Object

classitems.description: Opens links with AJAX
classitems.name: openAjax

params.name: data
params.description: Object: data.href = link (a tag) as jQuery Object, String: URL, jQuery Object: a link (a tag) element

classitems.description: Fires Callback, see {{#crossLink "MultiDialog/_fireCallback:method"}}{{/crossLink}} for return value.
classitems.name: on.ajaxError

classitems.description: Opens any HTML content
classitems.name: openAjax

params.name: data
params.description: Object: data.element = any HTML element as jQuery Object, String: plain HTML string, jQuery Object: any HTML element

classitems.description: Helper to normalize incoming link parameter
classitems.name: _openLinkHelper

params.name: data
params.description: Object: data.element = link (a tag) as jQuery Object, String: URL, jQuery Object: either a link (a tag) or any HTML element

return.description: Normalized object with data.href or at least data.element

classitems.description: Opens a dialog: very flexible with all auto magic
classitems.name: open

params.name: data
params.description: Pass in one of the following types:

props.name: object
props.description: Object with at least one: html, href or element.

props.name: jquery
props.description: jQuery object containing an "a" tag or any other HTML element (its content will be opened)

classitems.description: Checks if the dialog needs to be created or opened
classitems.name: _open

classitems.description: Opens a dialog in gallery mode: very flexible with all auto magic
classitems.name: openGallery

params.name: group
params.description: Array: An simple array with MultiDialog data objects  (see {{#crossLink "MultiDialog/open:method"}}{{/crossLink}} options), jQuery object: containing a set of elements or a link (a tag) elements

params.name: index
params.description: jQuery Object: a link tag element within the group parameter, Integer: a index starting with 0; default is the firs element in group parameter

classitems.description: Next item in gallery group
classitems.name: next

classitems.description: Previous item in gallery group
classitems.name: prev

classitems.description: First item in gallery group
classitems.name: first

classitems.description: Last item in gallery group
classitems.name: last

classitems.description: Fires Callback, see {{#crossLink "MultiDialog/_fireCallback:method"}}{{/crossLink}} for return value.
classitems.name: on.move

classitems.description: Fires Callback, see {{#crossLink "MultiDialog/_fireCallback:method"}}{{/crossLink}} for return value.
classitems.name: on.createDialog

classitems.description: Fires Callback, see {{#crossLink "MultiDialog/_fireCallback:method"}}{{/crossLink}} for return value.
classitems.name: on.change
